languages.text: {n}Тонкий палец эльдара указывает на необычайный кристалл, парящий за его спиной, и окружающая вас труппа Арлекинов плотнее сжимает оружие в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тонкий палец эльдара указывает на необычайный кристалл, парящий за его спиной, и окружающая вас труппа Арлекинов плотнее сжимает оружие в руках. Их лица полны печали, а в глазах тлеет жажда отмщения".

languages.text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкий палец эльдара указывает на необычайный кристалл, парящий за его спиной, и окружающая вас труппа Арлекинов плотнее сжимает оружие в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten their grips on their weapons.{/n}
{n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten their grips on their weapons.{/n}

{n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼が細い指で自分の後ろで浮いていた美しいクリスタルを示すと、あなたの周囲のハーレクィンたちは自分の武器を握る手に力を込める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼が細い指で自分の後ろで浮いていた美しいクリスタルを示すと、あなたの周囲のハーレクィンたちは自分の武器を握る手に力を込める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他纤细的手指指向漂浮在身后的古怪水晶，你周围的所有丑角都握紧了手中的武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他纤细的手指指向漂浮在身后的古怪水晶，你周围的所有丑角都握紧了手中的武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Arlequins autour de vous s'agitent alors qu'il désigne l'immense cristal flottant derrière lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les arlequins autour de vous s'agitent alors qu'il désigne l'immense cristal flottant derrière lui.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Señala con su dedo delgado al sobrecogedor cristal que flota a su espalda, y los Arlequines que te rodean aferran sus armas con más fuerza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Señala con su dedo delgado al sobrecogedor cristal que flota a su espalda, y los Arlequines que te rodean aferran sus armas con más fuerza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er deutet mit seinem dünnen Finger auf den erstaunlichen Kristall, der hinter seinem Rücken schwebt, und die Harlekine um dich herum festigen ihren Griff an ihren Waffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er deutet mit seinem dünnen Finger auf den erstaunlichen Kristall, der hinter seinem Rücken schwebt, und die Harlekine um dich herum festigen ihren Griff an ihren Waffen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnce parmağıyla, arkasında süzülen dikkat çekici kristali işaret ediyor. Etrafını saran Arlekenler, silahlarını daha da sıkı tutmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points his thin finger at the remarkable crystal floating behind his back, and the Harlequins around you tighten the grips on their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnce parmağıyla arkasında havada süzülen dikkat çekici kristale işaret ediyor. Etrafını saran Arlekenler, silahlarını daha da sıkı tutmaya başlıyor.{/n}
